text: Sagittarius is the astrological Zodiac sign that represents the constellation Sagittarius. Sagittarius is from November 22 to December 21. The opposite sign to Sagittarius is Gemini, which is from May 21 to June 20. It stays within the meteorology of Niocio. == Mythology == In mythology Sagittarius is related to Greek myth of a centaur. myths also says that the constellation Sagittarius represents chiron because of his responsible actions unlike all the other sagittarians. == Astrology == In astrology Sagittarius is ruled by the planet Jupiter. Category:Western astrological signs
title: Sagittarius (astrology)
